urls.title: What is a storm overflow and how do they work?
urls.description: Heard of a storm overflow but not sure what it is? Watch this to find out what they are, why they operate and what we do to minimise their impact on the wate...

tweets.text:
What are storm overflows, and why do we use them?

Storm overflows play a role in preventing sewage from entering our homes or streets during periods of heavy rain or storms.

Watch our video to find out more about storm overflows: https://t.co/VBJFNTBAVE

Still no reply from @RedIndustries2 to our MP‚Äôs letter of March 19th, but their solicitors are quick enough to post threatening letters to members of the community.   I‚Äôm posting CEO Mr. Bowen a pen if he needs one for his reply #stopthestink https://t.co/cM82uODa4y

tweets.text: We are working with @EnvAgency  and  @FOIM_IlkleyMoor on a natural flood management  project to slow the flow of water from Ilkley Moor into Backstone Beck which flows into the River Wharfe. This work will also help peat bogs to form which store carbon.   https://t.co/Eh3svE5omT https://t.co/TtOAlMqpSr

Officers are attending the scene of a fire at a scrap metal yard in Sheffield, working with @SYFR to manage the risk of pollution from water used to fight the blaze. This includes dye-testing local drains, which may lead to a harmless discolouration to nearby watercourses. https://t.co/EB4mJUxLuA

@TamsinHill1 @RiverActionUK @SalmonTroutCons @HantsIWWildlife @AquiferChalk Hey Tamsin, we sent this over to the Environmental Agency the day you reported it to us, may be they have an update,¬†@EnvAgency can you assist?

Firefighting continued overnight at Carlisle Street, Sheffield.

We're making good progress, but will remain on scene for some time.

We're delivering 5,000 litres of water a minute onto the fire.

@EnvAgencyYNE, @PHE_uk and others are continuing to support us at this incident. https://t.co/QIQDQAVSH9

Well I thought I had a good sleep, then I realised I sent an email to the Environment Agency at 3.15am and now I remember waking up, smelling the stink of the landfill in my bedroom @StinkStopthe #StopTheStink #newcastleunderlyme

Our officers have been working with @SYFR 24/7 since Friday at a #fire in Burngreave, #Sheffield. Our intervention has helped contain up to 9,000 litres of water used per minute to tackle the fire, preventing it from draining to the nearby River Don and causing environmental harm https://t.co/Z0AZXg6kvA

Last week, I miscarried my baby. I had a level 4 haemorrhage and was rushed into life saving surgery. The only memory I have of leaving our home is the ambulance crew saying ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt now how you can live with this smell.‚Äù@StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency @Sotlive

Well done to @StinkStopthe for mobilising people power today. Hundreds of local people attended the protest. The @EnvAgencyMids and @PHE_uk must listen and close down Walleys Quarry landfill and move to the restoration phase of the site now! https://t.co/khbLjmEs27

Considering the worst weekend. I have formally requested the council hold an emergency meeting to vote on a motion to call on the environment agency to suspend operations at Walley‚Äôs Quarry Landfill, until the source of the stink is identified and resolved. https://t.co/F2aNUNQRVO

PLEASE!! Do you really think we will fall for this. The overflows are spewing their filth into our rivers all year round not just in storms. Quick q&a @EnvAgency - how many Met Office storms last year versus number of storm overflows releases. Any notion of correlation? https://t.co/LU1fSJar19

We were standing near you because I saw the sign! 
‚ÄúWe can‚Äôt breathe‚Äù sums it up @PHE_EoEngland @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @BorisJohnson 
When will a responsible authority act to protect our citizens? @StinkStopthe https://t.co/LyvEyEE2cC

tweets.text: @EnvAgency Happening here after 20 minutes of light, everyday rainfall. Hardly a " storm" in Yorkshire. These CSO's are being used to compensate for inadequate infrastructure, polluting our environment and putting public health at risk to save privately owned water companies money.

Disgraceful! Disadvantaging people at our universities & colleges now as well as the prospects of school children suffering headaches & concentration issues due to the fumes. Where is the equality? We deserve clean air! @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice https://t.co/c4eY3C4RWa

@DrMickSalt @StinkStopthe @WendyMa48697963 @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids If they were not full of dodgy stuff, they would be getting sold on ebay for ¬£70+ quid a pop ,suggests they are full of dodgy stuff imo

tweets.text:
1) What is the white liquid being dumped? Thought liquids weren‚Äôt permitted 
2) What happened to the voluntary curtailing of works except for capping materials? 
Still not aware that the public have been given answers re the previously suspicious items being dumped @EnvAgency https://t.co/5LwYRqhuP9

The stench has returned to Newcastle-under-lyme once again. It's absolutely fucking disgusting can't wait for another night with massive headaches and little sleep! Really considering moving back home early to do my final exams there. I hate this. @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids
@SimonTagg @NewsNBC @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency need to step up. I‚Äôm on hold to 111 as I can‚Äôt breathe

#GoodFriday #Fish fantastic video of #BrookLamprey spawning
Filmed by #Herefordshire farmer Tony Norman a leading ambassador for the protection and improvement of our rivers in the #Wye catchment. 
#SpawningWatch 
@WUFoundation @theriverstrust @RiverFishUk @EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/0jtpX2nKyd

The @EnvAgency must do more & Govt must start reinvesting in it in the Spending Review if they're to be taken seriously at @COP26 üëá https://t.co/kmGbKbY5J7
@SianieRoo @WendyMa48697963 @EnvAgency Wasn‚Äôt me mate.

This ITV report is as shocking as yesterday‚Äôs news from the @EnvAgency . This is the death of an iconic river in slow motion - largely due to unmitigated agricultural pollution. The intensive poultry industry needs to clean itself up ASAP for starters @thenoblefoods https://t.co/d1pmbc1Fug

Thanks to the @EnvAgency Women‚Äôs Network for inviting me to a powerful meeting on women‚Äôs experience in the workplace this week. I am committed to making the Environment Agency an equitable, diverse and inclusive organisation https://t.co/jH03i4Cl0p
Woken at midnight by the gas in my house, it's all through the house still this morning. Reported to @EnvAgency & @NewsNBC #WalleysQuarry @StinkStopthe https://t.co/nmwuekZvvr
Thank you for the coverage but 'bad smell' just doesn't cut it. This is poisonous gas we are forced to breathe here! #WalleysQuarry @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/Ouwm9gzZ2M
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Could you offer an explanation as to why IBC's full of liquid are being dumped in the landfill? #stopthestink #capitoff https://t.co/YJogvuquxn
@SimonTagg @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk couldn't make it today but drove past and peeped the horn! fantastic turnout!! üëèüëèüëè smell was horrendous up Cemetery Rd!

My question is this are we being punished for speaking/ standing together for what is right! We have a right for better AIR Quality! Seems funny how it's super strong tonight
@StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg

I hope @EnvAgencyMids take note of this show of our determination and resolve.
